ทำไม Sentiment ของ XRP จึงพุ่งขึ้นเป็นบวกในขณะที่ Bitcoin และ Ethereum เผชิญความทุกข์?

Why Is XRP Sentiment Rising To The Positive While Bitcoin And Ethereum Suffer?

7h ago//Sandra White
bitcoinethereumaltcoins
AI

Summary

TH

แม้ว่าตลาดคริปโตโดยรวมจะกำลังดิ้นรนด้วยแรงกดดันขาลงและความรู้สึกเชิงลบที่หนักแน่นใน Bitcoin (BTC) และ Ethereum (ETH) แต่ XRP กลับกลายเป็นเหรียญเพียงเหรียญเดียวที่นักลงทุนเริ่มมีทัศนคติเชิงบวก ข้อมูลจาก Santiment ระบุว่าแม้ราคา XRP จะร่วงลงต่ำกว่า $1.4 แต่ความเชื่อมั่นของนักลงทุนกลับพุ่งสูงขึ้นถึงระดับ 4.07 ซึ่งเป็นการกลับตัวที่น่าประหลาดใจเมื่อเทียบกับคู่แข่ง ปัจจัยหลักที่ขับเคลื่อนแนวโน้มเชิงบวกของ XRP มาจากความต้องการจากสถาบันที่เพิ่มขึ้นต่อ XRP ETF ในขณะที่ Spot Bitcoin ETF และ Ethereum ETF ต่างประสบกับการไหลออกของเงินทุนจำนวนมหาศาล XRP ETFs กลับเป็นผลิตภัณฑ์เพียงอย่างเดียวที่แสดงผลกำไรและได้รับความสนใจ ส่งผลให้ความเชื่อมั่นในโทเคนนี้กลับคืนมาแม้จะอยู่ในภาวะตลาดที่อ่อนแอ

EN

Amidst a broader market downturn, Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH) are facing intense bearish pressure and overwhelmingly negative sentiment. However, XRP has defied the trend, with investor sentiment shifting into positive territory despite the token crashing below $1.4. Santiment data highlights that while sentiment for BTC and ETH has dropped significantly, XRP has seen a surge in confidence, reaching a sentiment score of 4.07 recently. The rising positivity for XRP is largely attributed to growing institutional demand for XRP ETFs. Unlike Spot Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs, which have experienced massive capital outflows recently, XRP ETFs are the only products showing gains. This shift in institutional interest has bolstered investor confidence in XRP even as prices for major cryptocurrencies struggle.

Key Points

  • XRP sentiment has turned positive while Bitcoin and Ethereum face negative market sentiment.
  • Santiment data shows XRP sentiment jumped to 4.07, contrasting with the low scores of BTC and ETH.
  • Institutional demand for XRP ETFs is driving the positive sentiment.
  • Spot Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs are seeing significant outflows, while XRP ETFs are recording gains.

Article

Trusted Editorial content, reviewed by leading industry experts and seasoned editors. Ad Disclosure While Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), and most cryptocurrencies are struggling with overwhelmingly negative market sentiment , XRP appears to be the only coin on which investors have suddenly turned bullish. Despite crashing below $1.4 this week, new reports indicate that XRP’s market sentiment is moving into positive territory, suggesting investor confidence in the token is shifting amid broader market weakness . XRP Sentiment Turns Positive As Bitcoin And Ethereum Struggle Bitcoin and Ethereum are facing intense bearish pressure , with market sentiment around the two largest cryptocurrencies remaining negative. Despite the broader market pullback, sentiment readings on XRP are unexpectedly positive. Recent data from crypto analytics platform Santiment show that, as of January 7, 2026, Bitcoin’s negative sentiment has dropped to 1.39, and Ethereum’s has fallen to 1.73, reflecting growing fear and uncertainty among investors amid the broader crypto downturn. Santiment’s chart indicates that market sentiment surrounding Bitcoin and Ethereum had steadily deteriorated since the beginning of the year. Source: Santiment Although Ethereum’s sentiment briefly rose to 2.12 in early January as the price attempted several recoveries, market perception quickly reversed and plunged as the cryptocurrency continued to decline. Meanwhile, Bitcoin has shown minimal improvement in market psychology, with sentiment remaining firmly in negative territory since the beginning of January. The cryptocurrency’s recent breakdown below $70,000 has further intensified bearish readings, fueling concerns among market watchers that it may now be in a full-scale bear market, with additional near-term downside pressure expected. This substantial decline in sentiment for Bitcoin and Ethereum highlights XRP’s unusual bullish position in the market. Given that its price crashed below $1.3 at the time of writing, market sentiment for XRP was widely expected to remain negative. However, against all odds, the cryptocurrency has managed to regain investors’ positive outlook and confidence. Santiment data shows that XRP’s market sentiment rose to 4.07 on January 7, up from 1.39 the day before. Since the beginning of January, the cryptocurrency’s sentiment has remained below 2, reflecting significant caution and uncertainty among investors ahead of the recent unexpected change. The rise in XRP’s positive sentiment is largely attributed to growing institutional demand for the cryptocurrency’s Exchange-Traded Fund (ETF). While Spot Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs continue to experience outflows, XRP ETFs are the only products showing gains. Data from SoSoValue shows that Spot Bitcoin ETFs have posted only two days of positive inflows since January 16, with the most recent daily outflow totaling $434.15 million on February 5. Ethereum ETFs have faced similar losses , registering positive inflows on only three occasions since January 20. It recorded its largest outflow this year on January 21, when approximately $297.51 million left the asset. Meanwhile, XRP Spot ETFs have outperformed , recording only four days of outflows since the beginning of January, reflecting growing confidence and a shift in institutional interest toward the cryptocurrency.
